metadata.name: Subway Series
metadata.description: Subway Series follows the exploits of Tina, a frustrated sixteen-year-old city girl whose affections are divided between two guys. The problem is, one has an out of town girlfriend and the other is a complete jerk. Add to that a cruel adversary whom she once called a friend who's out to humiliate her, and now confused Tina doesn't know which way to turn. Time Magazine observes: "The teenage life that Leela Corman depicts in 'Subway Series' has less in common with the world of Archie and Veronica and more in common with the movie 'Kids..." The debut graphic novel from the creator of Unterzakhn.
